message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement provided, the line item that represents general management and administration costs is "Administrative Expenses".

From the table, I can see that Administrative Expenses amount to 14043.00 as of 2024-02-02.

Therefore, the value of costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole is 14043.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '14043.00'}}
```
